result.arabic_text: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ
result.translation: Maze hasigare gusa Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Yo Yonyene ubwayo, Nyenicubahiro kirengeye vyose, Nyenubugwaneza[4].
result.footnotes: [4] Muri iyi Aayah, harimwo icemezo c’uko Imana Allah Ifise mu maso mu buryo buberanye n’icubahiro cayo, ata kugereranya mu maso hayo n’ah’ibiremwa mu kuntu hasa n’ukuntu haremye.
